sentences.cn: 他的滑板车是黄色的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Currently, electric scooter - style and offroad bikes can be used on the streets.
sentences.cn: 目前, 电动车,风格和越野自行车可用于街头.

sentences.en: For sale: small motor scooter. Enquire within.
sentences.cn: 待售: 小型摩托车, 请进内询问.

sentences.en: Hold tight when you ride at the back of your brother's scooter.
sentences.cn: 你坐在你哥哥的摩托车后面时,要抓牢.

sentences.en: Lex & I rent a scooter to look around this island.
sentences.cn: 我跟 雷克斯 租了台机车,在这岛上乱骑乱晃.

sentences.en: One day, I pinched a scooter and followed him.
sentences.cn: 有一天, 我拿了一辆滑板车跟着他.

sentences.en: Sam is capable of lifting a scooter off the ground barehanded.
sentences.cn: 山姆可以徒手举起一台摩托车.

sentences.en: Scooter, Finger Scooter, Finger Skateboard, Roller Skate, Snow Board. Toy and Games.
sentences.cn: 采购产品摩托车, 手指摩托车, 手指滑板, 滚筒溜冰鞋, 雪搭乘. 玩具和游戏.

sentences.en: So you wanna buy a scooter?
sentences.cn: 你想买一辆踏板车 吗 ?

sentences.en: The number will match the engine number of your scooter.
sentences.cn: 而这组号码就是机车引擎上的号码.

sentences.en: The scooter dates back to Germany in 1894.
sentences.cn: 速克达的历史要追溯到1894年的德国.

sentences.en: This motor - scooter is my latest acquisition.
sentences.cn: 这辆摩托车是我最新购置的.

sentences.en: This scooter didn't have a foot pedal to accelerate like the military motorcycles back then.
sentences.cn: 这台速克达并不像当时的军用摩托车是用脚踏板来加速.

sentences.en: When will you get around to fixing my scooter?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候才会有空修我的摩托车?

sentences.en: Would you like to ride my new scooter?
sentences.cn: 你想不想骑我的新滑板车？

words.tran_cn: 溜走；快走；骑轻便摩托车

phrases.tran_cn: n. 小型摩托车；座式摩托车；机车

trans.tran_en: a type of small, less powerful  motorcycle  with small wheels
